price: Ani isa (waamicha kana) irratti mindaa tokkollee isin hin gaafadhu; Mindaan kiyya Gooftaa aalama hundaa irratti malee hin taane.
arabic: وَمَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٍۖ إِنۡ أَجۡرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wamā asalukum ʿalayhi min ajrin in ajriya illā ʿalā rabbi al-ʿālamīna
